testcase.classname: user can add different products to cart
testcase.name: Logged user could compare products
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to login page...........................................passed And User enters a valid "test@email.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And User clicks on login....................................................passed Then User should login successfully.........................................passed When the user has navigated to a category page: "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/books".passed And user clicks on add to comparlist button of products.....................passed Then user is shown an add comparlist success notification...................passed And clicking on success bar's link navigates user to compare page...........passed

testcase.classname: User can change currency for us to euro
testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: When Logged in user clicks on currency dropdown list........................passed And user selects another currency...........................................passed Then products' prices should change to this currency........................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to filter listings by color
testcase.name: Logged user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to login page...........................................passed And User enters a valid "test@email.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And User clicks on login....................................................passed Then User should login successfully.........................................passed When that the user has navigated to a PLP page with color filter available..passed And user selects a color....................................................passed Then listings are filtered to only show products with this color............passed

testcase.name: User is able to reset password successfully
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to login page...........................................passed And User Clicks on forget password..........................................passed And enter "test@email.com" and clicks on recover............................passed Then User is shown a success message........................................passed

testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to login page..........................................passed When User enters a valid "test@email.com" and "P@ssw0rd"....................passed And User clicks on login....................................................passed Then User should login successfully.........................................passed And Navigates to HP.........................................................passed

testcase.classname: User could register with valid data
testcase.name: User registering with valid data
testcase.system-out: And User navigates to registration page.....................................passed When User enters valid credentials 'Aya' and "Fouad" and "supernewemail@test.com" and "password" and "password".passed And User clicks register button.............................................passed Then User can register successfully.........................................passed

testcase.name: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: When Logged in user type a search keyword "book"............................passed And User clicks on search...................................................passed Then User should be navigated to search result page for "book"..............passed And Search results contains search keyword "book"...........................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to login page..........................................passed And User enters a valid "test@email.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And User clicks on login....................................................passed Then User should login successfully.........................................passed When user navigates to a product listing page and filter by tags............passed And user clicks on another tag..............................................passed Then user is navigated to the related page of this tag......................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to login page...........................................passed And User enters a valid "test@email.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And User clicks on login....................................................passed Then User should login successfully.........................................passed When user hovers over a category from nav menu..............................passed Then user should be navigated to this new subcategory.......................passed
